type: Legendary Creature – Human Dragon Advisor Noble
rules_text:
Fear
[i]Queen Mother[/i] – When Almedha, Queen Mother of Daien enters, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
[i]Confidante[/i] – At the beginning of your end step, reveal the top card of your library. You may put that card into your hand. If you do, you lose life equal to that cards mana value. If you don't, exile it and each opponent loses life equal to that cards mana value.
